issues.description: The problem statement text specifies that the addGuestStudents method should take a String parameter, but the UML diagram within the same problem statement and the solution implementation use an int parameter. This inconsistency could confuse students about the expected parameter type, potentially leading them to implement the wrong signature and fail tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement text to specify 'addGuestStudents(int)' to match the UML diagram and solution implementation, ensuring all artifacts are consistent and students receive clear guidance on the method signature.
